name: Garlic Shrimp Foil Packs
description: Quick 15-minute garlic shrimp foil packs are packed full of flavor. Make this a healthy meal by adding your favorite vegetables!
ingredients: 1 pound large shrimp, peeled and deveined
3-4 cups chopped zucchini, or your favorite vegetables
instructions: Add all the ingredients to a large bowl. Mix to combine. Place four 18Ã—12-inch pieces of heavy aluminum foil on counter. Place the shrimp and veggie mixture on the foil. Fold the foil over the shrimp to seal. Grill or bake at 400 degrees for 15-20 minutes or until shrimp and vegetables are cooked through. Serve with rice, bread or salad.
